body: I think this would be less gross if we didn't use prim::Constant to create the world token. It would allow this pass to stay the same, and the changes elsewhere to do it are no larger than the current code.
body_html: I think this would be less gross if we didn't use prim::Constant to create the world token. It would allow this pass to stay the same, and the changes elsewhere to do it are no larger than the current code.
